ygData.subject: Re: My wishlist on the interface
ygData.msgSnippet: Who want a big old nasty bow?  I d rather have a Crossbow :)  Much cooler, too bad they are not in the game :( Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server Master Brewer
ygData.messageBody:
Who want a big old nasty bow? I'd rather have a Crossbow :) Much cooler,
too bad they are not in the game :(

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] My wishlist on the interface
>Date: Fri, 9 Jul 1999 08:31:06 -0500
>
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>I carry 20 throwing knives - carry over from before Bellow - for pulling
>mobs out of a hopefully lulled crowd. Plus I like the idea of throwing a
>dagger <eg> If I loot rustys, I'll throw them for fun. And now pass me
>the
>cheese, I am about to whine...
>
><waaa> I wish bards could equip bows! I think it looks so cool when
>someone
>shoots a bow and arrow! And looking cool is most important for bards!
>Lets
>petition them and get SoW made slower and bow and arrows for bards! <eg>
>
><mmm nice camembert>
>
>Sylly
>Bard of the 13th level
>a.k.a. Robo-Bard
>camped out in Qeynos Hills on Innoruuk
>
>
> -----Original Message-----

> Subject: Re: [eqbards] My wishlist on the interface
